document_data.name: Ghaark Ironseth
document_data.mainbody: '''Lord Ghaark Ironseth''' was a [[human]] of [[Amnwater]], [[Amn]], around [[1368 DR]], where he led the [[Ironseth]] family, owners of about half of the land around Amnwater.
document_data.Personality: Lord Ironseth was known as a noisy and insensitive man.
document_data.Relationships: Ghaark's third son was the blacksmith [[Togar Ironseth]].
